channel.title: 🏢 Colorado State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Colorado State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Expectation Alignment: Handling Reward Misspecification in the Presence of Expectation Mismatch
item.description: This paper introduces Expectation Alignment (EAL), a novel framework and interactive algorithm to address reward misspecification in AI, aligning AI behavior with user expectations.
